title: US approves offshore wind project off Maryland coast
description: The Biden administration has approved a wind project off Maryland's coast, advancing its goal of deploying 30 gigawatts of offshore wind energy by 2030. The Maryland Offshore Wind Project, developed by US Wind, aims to power 718,000 homes. Despite setbacks like rising costs and supply chain issues, officials remain committed to their target.
